item.title: Green hydrogen consumption to be escalated from 2040, says Atul Jairaj, Deloitte
item.description: Deloitte's report at ETAuto Tech Summit 2024 calls for a transition from ICE to non-ICE vehicles like CNG, LPG, biofuel, green hydrogen, and EVs to reduce import bills and achieve sustainability. FY 2023-24 saw 232.5 million metric tonnes of crude oil imports. The report targets carbon neutrality by 2070 and greenhouse gas reductions by 2045, addressing vehicle afterlife sustainability.

item.title: Houston Texans Tytus Howard asked Twitter for help with his pickup stuck in flooded ditch
